remarks: Function-builder for derivative, division rule for constant divisor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
statement:
dvmptadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptadd.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptadd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptadd.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptcmul.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
dvmptdivc.0 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
dvmptdivc $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> ( A / C ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( B / C ) ) ) $.
$d C x $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
